attributes.action: Fine NON Bluebadge holders for parking in Disabled car park spaces
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I think that NON Blue badge holders if caught parking in Disabled Car Park spaces should be fined £60 and 3 points on their Driving Licence.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
